name: Highway racing survival
description:
Highway racing has been up for so long and is now being modified into Highway racing survival.
Survive for As long as you can and keep the top rank for atleast a week to be called the best racer.

*please comment if game is slow on your device*

KEY FEATURES
- Stunning Realistic 3D graphics
-Capatible with all mobiles
-3 Camera angles (inside, back and top )
- Nitro boost
-Real challenge in escaping cars
- Real physic graphic effects - Smooth and realistic car handling
- 11+ different cars to choose from
- 3 detailed environments: sunny, rainy and city night
- 4 game modes: Endless, Two-Way, Time Trial and bomb Ride
- Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses.
- Basic customization through paint and wheels
- Online Leaderboards
-Unlock Achievements
-Check your rank in the global dashboard
-Bus carrying Bomb most not explode. GAMEPLAY
- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down TIPS
- The faster you drive the more scores you get and the more distance you gain.
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
- Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cash
-Use ramp to jump into air for stunts

**GAME MADE BY CIRCLESGAMES,
CHARACTERS USED ON GAME WAS GOTTEN FROM PICART.
PLEASE RATE US.
Music used was gotten from:- free-stock-music.com
